False decentralization

“Decentralization” offered by gatekeepers themselves within their own platform.

Classic example: Meta’s Threads on ActivityPub – it appears federated, but Meta retains full control over accounts, moderation, and data, with limited integration (no full 2-way federation as of 2025).

It looks open, but remains under their control — more luxurious cells in the same prison.

See also → Walled garden · Independent protocols · Thesis 5
